ValidationRule.description: Rule to not let the users to change the stage on Oppty past Cost Estimate stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DE_Opportunity', PRIORVALUE(Probability) >= 0.60, PRIORVALUE(Probability) < 0.80, Probability < 0.60, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), 'Cancel')), NOT(OR( $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "Data Integrator", $Profile.Name = "DE Salesforce Admin")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This operation cannot be perfomed as Opportunity has passed 'Cost Estimate' stage.
